metadata.description:
Collects Daken: Dark Wolverine #5-9 & X-23 #7-9.

Daken is out to prove to the world he's the best there is at what he does, one country at a time - and he's starting with Madripoor! But will the most dangerous men and women in the world simply topple where they stand, or will Daken find the tables turned - and his neck in a noose? Then, it's the crossover you've been waiting for, as Daken and X-23 join forces to hunt down Malcolm Colcord, the man responsible for countless reincarnations of the Weapon X Project!
metadata.name: Daken and X-23
